channel.title: Academy on hacklog
channel.description: Recent content in Academy on hacklog

item.title: ACM DL is allowing open access to every article until June
item.description: ACM has decided to allow open access to every article in ACM DL until June 30, to help people doing remote works due to COVID-19. I found this by checking my papers in ACM DL. I believe this is a great decision of ACM.

item.title: ACM DL is allowing open access to every article until June
item.description: COVID-19 로 인해 원격 업무를 해야하는 사람들을 위해 ACM 이 ACM DL 의 모든 논문을 6월 30일까지 누구나 볼 수 있게 했습니다. ACM DL 에 올라와 있는 제 논문들을 보러 갔다가 우연히 알게 됐네요. ACM 이 참 잘한 선택 같습니다.

item.title: The Paper about GCMA Accepted to TC
item.description: A paper about GCMA project has accepted to a top-level computer science journal, Transactions on Computers[1]. It will be published soon. [1] https://www.computer.org/web/tc

item.title: The Paper about GCMA Accepted to TC
item.description: GCMA 에 대한 논문이 컴퓨터 과학계의 최고 수준 저널인 Transactions on Computers[1] 에 Accept 되었습니다. 조만간 이를 통해 출간될 예정입니다. [1] https://www.computer.org/web/tc
